question_text: Which of the following is a benefit of SaaS for organizations without a development team?
answer_options: Applications are built and deployed manually
The provider offers on-demand software with no coding required
Developers have access to OS-level scripting
Customers install and patch every app update
correct_answer: The provider offers on-demand software with no coding required
explanation: SaaS is especially useful for organizations without coding teams because the provider manages the app lifecycle.
